wikipedia_page.main: James Watson (born c. 1883 in Inverness, Scotland died 19??) was a Scottish footballer who played for Sunderland and Chelsea. Watson made his Sunderland debut against Wolverhampton Wanderers on 24 October 1903 in a 2–1 defeat at The Molineux Stadium. He was at Sunderland during 1903 to 1904 and played in just five games, scoring no goals. He later played for Chelsea.
